Can I make this persistent?

`r devoirs_text("try-persistent")`

<button id='foo-save'>save</button>
<button id='foo-restore'>restore</button>

<script type="text/javascript">

      //save entered info
      document.getElementById("foo-save").addEventListener("click", function () {
        var todo = document.getElementById("try-persistent").value;
        console.log(todo);
        localStorage.setItem("try-persistent", todo);
        alert("Saved text");
        console.log("Saved text")
      }, false);

      //reload last session
      document.getElementById("foo-restore").addEventListener("click", function () {
        document.getElementById("try-persistent").value = localStorage.getItem("try-persistent");
        alert("Reloaded text");
        console.log("Reloaded text")
      }, false);

    </script>
